title: Center for Gender Affirming Medicine
description: Akron Children's Hospital offers the Center for Gender Affirming Medicine under its Adolescent Medicine department. It caters to transgender and LGBTQ+ youth, providing a team of specialist physicians, social workers, psychologists, and an endocrinologist. The center offers medical and mental health support to create a gender-diverse environment where youth can explore their gender identity. Services provided include pubertal suppression, gender-affirming hormones, mental health care coordination, well checks/preventive visits and education/supportive care.
